channel.title: Project Sony PvP amour D claws and much more!
channel.description:
8.7k views!
Project Sony Thanks for looking at the thread
Base - black pearl
Creditz
Baslem - 15% fusion - 45% me - 25% tonic - 10% Jamiz - %5
Features
There are lot of features
Feature/Pictures Dragon claws with special attack Dark Bow with special attack PvP amour Vesta long sword special attack Status hammer Special attack Loadz of custum interfaces Cleaned out client Dueling removed - Fixes loadz of dupes Stable base Stable mining base
Lots of more features check it out yourself
[img]http://i37.tinypic.com/ixr3m8.png[/img] [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/10q9sex.png[/img] [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/11w6ez4.png[/img] [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/egzosp.png[/img] [img]http://img130.imageshack.us/img130/8295/projectsonyclientv32009.png[/img]
Make sure u rate and comment!
Server - http://www.multiupload.com/4G11IGDASB server - http://www.multiupload.com/4G11IGDASB server - http://www.multiupload.com/4G11IGDASB
Client download - http://www.multiupload.com/PO7F25ARKF Client download - http://www.multiupload.com/PO7F25ARKF Client download - http://www.multiupload.com/PO7F25ARKF
The client i did alot of work on So u dont have to flip the imagies enjoy! RATE _ COMMENT!
r-s name is java is cool Leechers burn in hell!
Also the fourms are closed so you wont be able to connect...
